PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ZoneCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcZone.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1')

PropertyDef.Name: OccupancyType
PropertyDef.Definition: Occupancy type for this object. It is defined according to the presiding national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: OccupancyNumber
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum number of occupants for the designed usage of the zone.

PropertyDef.Name: PubliclyAccessible
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this space (in case of e.g., a toilet) is designed to serve as a publicly accessible space, e.g., for a public toilet (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: HandicapAccessible
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this space (in case of e.g., a toilet) is designed to serve as an accessible space for handicapped people, e.g., for a public toilet (TRUE) or not (FALSE). This information is often used to declare the need for access for the disabled and for special design requirements of this space.

PropertyDef.Name: NaturalVentilation
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the zone is required to have natural ventilation (true) or mechanical ventilation (false).

PropertyDef.Name: NaturalVentilationRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of the requirement of a particular natural air ventilation rate, given in air changes per hour.

PropertyDef.Name: MechanicalVentilationRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of the requirement of a particular mechanical air ventilation rate, given in air changes per hour.
